sections.heading: woman.A woman may while married sue and be sued in the same manner as if she were unmarried
sections.text: SourceLaws 1871, § 3, p. 68;R.S.1913, § 7586;C.S.1922, § 8529;C.S.1929, § 20-305;R.S.1943, § 25-305.AnnotationsCommon-law doctrine of interspousal tort immunity is abrogated; husband or wife is not immune fro
